<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Lists Files with Errors</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/code/api/v1/errors/files"}></MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

List files with errors.
